title: Not being able to buy a champion?
body: I've been trying to buy mordekaiser, since I have over 3150 ip, but it says I don't have enough. I tried relogging to see if something was wrong, and I didn't get anything. Could I get some help?

replies.body:
This is an issue that cropped up shortly after the recent store outage last week. I recommend hopping back to the Legacy Client in order to provoke the client to sync your proper IP values. If this doesn't work, then we'll need you to submit a support ticket so we can try some things from our side. Below is a screenshot showing where you can access the Legacy Client from login.

(Click to Enlarge)
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions.

Yeah I am trying to buy a champion shard, I have 1900 IP, and yet it still tells me "not enough IP/RP"....For a Champion token (1700ip)
Is is an error? a glitch, something broken? what?
I am having the same issue, but no one is responding to my discussion and I can't find any source that helps with the issue. Sorry this comment isn't any help either D:
